column4: so, there are app repositories or something right? how does that work :|
i double clicked my volume thingy when my sound didnt work
it showed the device at the top...it was on the wrong one..
i changed it to the right onee
thats a cool thing, however it works, guntbert

read that please: The packages in Ubuntu are divided into several sections. More information at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Repositories and http://www.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/components - See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RecommendedSources for the recommended way to set up your repositories
no need to be sorry (was just a hint to make life easier for all of us)- as for 3rd party repos: I don't trust them generally, but if I "need" something I add the repo to my sources
are there any closed source apps? lol
look at the link I sent you, there different kinds of repos, but *most* are free (as in free speech)
